sentences.sContent: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.sCn: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

sentences.sContent: ...The demand for energy resources may compel renegotiation of Antarctica’s treaties before their expiration...
...Other studies have shown that saddling employees with unrealistic goals can compel them to lie...

remMethod.val: com ＋ pel(驱使) → 驱使去做 → 强迫

words.tran: 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的
强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to force someone to do something
